text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @SpeakerPelosi @HouseDemocrats @HouseGOP

#FridayThoughts

Just a reminder...

Trump only wanted $2.5 billion in funding for #COVID19 #Coronavirus, but thanks to a 𝐛𝐢𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐚𝐧 effort an $8.3 billion funding was passed instead.
